content.description: A property name of data model represents content of tree view.

html.description: Indicate that the content is in HTML format. If set true then `content` property will be ignored, you'll need to supply `htmlContent` property instead.

htmlContent.description: Html content that displayed on tree content area. You must set `html` property to `true` to use this property.

children.description: A property name of data model represents children property. Children property must be in array type contains list of `model`.

parentTag.description: HTML parent tag name. Default is `ul`.

childTag.description: HTML child tag name. Default is `li`.
